text:
TUESDAY, MAY 3
Work-Study Groups
Deshler-Wallic\ Hotel TUESDAY
2:00 P. M.
A continuation of the sessions of Monday afternoon.
i. Agricultural Broadcasts. Room 1479
Wallace Kadderly, Acting Chief of Radio Service, U. S. Department of Agricul¬
ture, Chairman
2. School Broadcasts. Room 1340
Paul T. Rankin, Supervising Director of Research and Informational Service, De¬
troit Public Schools, Chairman
3. Radio Courses in Universities. Room 1440
Cline M. Koon, New York City, Chairman
4. Research in Radio Education. Room 1437
Frank N. Stanton, Manager of the Market Research Division, Columbia Broad¬
casting System, Chairman
5. Technical Radio Developments. Room 1537
R. C. Higgy, Director, Station WOSU, Ohio State University, Chairman
6. Broadcasts for General Education. Room 1540
Sterling Fisher, Director of Radio Talks and Education, Columbia Broadcasting
System, Chairman
' 5 '
